channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Did Intel's next big thing in workstations just leak? Ahead of Granite Rapids launch, report claims this is what's next from troubled chipmaker
item.description: Intel’s next HEDT workstation platform supports high-end memory, multiple PCIe lanes, and robust connectivity, challenging AMD’s Threadripper ecosystem.

item.title: Can Starlink be blocked? Scary Chinese simulation shows 1,000 drones can jam satellite internet over an island as large as Taiwan
item.description: A Chinese study shows that Starlink could be totally blocked out over a large island by a swarm of drones.

item.title: Darty brade ce PC Acer avec RTX 5060 : offre limitée Black Friday
item.description: C'est probablement le PC gamer le plus rentable du moment en termes de puissance pure. Si vous cherchez une station de jeu mobile efficace et abordable pour le Black Friday, regardez cette offre de près.

item.title: C’est le roi des 14 pouces : l’Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 avec RTX 5070 devient (enfin) accessible
item.description: Trouver un PC portable qui tient dans un petit sac à dos mais capable de faire tourner Cyberpunk 2077 à fond, c'est la quête impossible. Sauf quand Darty décide de casser le prix du meilleur 14 pouces du marché.

item.title: Congress Calls Anthropic CEO to Testify About AI Cyberattack Allegedly From China
item.description: "We believe this is the first documented case of a large-scale cyberattack executed without substantial human intervention," Anthropic said earlier this month.

item.title: Stockage Switch et Steam Deck : grosse chute de prix sur la microSDXC SanDisk Ultra de 1 To
item.description: Vous passez votre temps à désinstaller des jeux sur votre console portable ? Arrêtez tout. SanDisk casse le prix de sa carte la plus massive, et c'est le moment idéal pour étendre votre stockage.

item.title: My number one office chair gets a discount of almost $100 - and not even Amazon can beat that for Black Friday
item.description: The Branch Verve is my top-rated office chair, and not even Amazon can match the low price for it in this Black Friday deal.

item.title: The ‘Mighty Nein’ Creators Wanted to Make a ‘Darker, More Impactful’ Show
item.description: When it came to 'The Mighty Nein,' the Critical Role team wanted to adapt the live show and get its hands dirty in the process.

item.title: Nordic founders are taking bigger swings, and it’s paying off
item.description: Ten years ago, raising €1 million in Copenhagen was enough to make waves in the region’s tech scene. Today, the Nordics are turning out billion-dollar companies like Lovable — which hit $200M in revenue just 12 months after launching. Dennis Green-Lieber, founder of AI-powered customer intelligence platform Propane, has had a front-row seat to that shift over the […]...

item.title: MIT study finds AI is already capable of replacing 11.7% of U.S. workers
item.description: The study finds routine roles in HR, logistics and finance face more disruption than previously forecast. A new study from MIT that shows that AI might be poised to replace a lot more jobs than what initial estimates might predict. According to researchers, a hidden mass of data reveals that AI is currently capable of taking over 11.7% of the labor market....

item.title: Pourquoi cette offre sur le monstre de Dyson vaut vraiment le détour
item.description: Vous cherchiez une excuse pour remplacer votre vieil aspirateur poussif ? Le Gen5detect, véritable monstre de puissance, voit enfin son prix dégringoler sous la barre symbolique des 550 euros grâce à un cumul d'offres.

item.title: Here are the 49 US AI startups that have raised $100M or more in 2025
item.description: Last year was monumental for the AI industry in the U.S. and beyond. How will 2025 compare?

item.title: Campbell’s fired the VP recorded saying its meat ‘came from a 3D printer’
item.description: Campbell’s says it fired its vice president of information technology after leaked audio allegedly captured him saying the company uses meat that “came from a 3D printer.” The comments led Campbell’s to issue an explanation on its website, insisting its soups aren’t made with 3D-printed chicken, lab-grown chicken, or bioengineered meat. “A recent video contained […]...

item.title: ‘Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance’ May Be Dead, but Its Props Commanded Top Dollar
item.description: A recent auction brought in nearly $3 million thanks to collectors hungry for Gelfling puppets and other Jim Henson Company treasures.

item.title: Save $900 on Sony’s Best Mirrorless Camera With This Early Black Friday Deal (2025)
item.description: Sony’s top-of-the-line A7R V mirrorless camera is at the lowest price it’s ever been, and so is the more video-friendly A7 IV.

item.title: JustiGuide wants to use AI to help people navigate the US immigration system
item.description: The startup uses AI to help immigrants understand the system, connect with lawyers, and reduce associated costs.

item.title: There’s an AI Industry Civil War Brewing in D.C.
item.description: A tale of two AI super PACs.

item.title: Norton's Black Friday VPN deals have arrived with prices slashed across plans
item.description: Plans start from only $2.08 per month for Norton's excellent VPN, with Black Friday prices set to run until December 2.

item.title: Top Linux PC maker drops plan for SnapdragonX Elite-powered notebook - says hardware was "less suitable than expected."
item.description: Tuxedo cancels Snapdragon X Elite Linux notebook after technical hurdles, planning to monitor Snapdragon X2 Elite for potential future development.

item.title: Plus de trafic aérien = plus d’argent ? Une étude européenne casse le récit dominant
item.description: Est-ce la hausse du niveau de vie qui conduit les gens à prendre davantage l’avion ou est-ce l’augmentation du trafic qui apporte de nouvelles opportunités économiques ? Le think-tank New Economics Foundation et l’ONG Transport & Environment (T&E) se sont penchés sur la question et la réponse...

item.title: OpenAI claims teen circumvented safety features before suicide that ChatGPT helped plan
item.description: In August, parents Matthew and Maria Raine sued OpenAI and its CEO, Sam Altman, over their 16-year-old son Adam's suicide, accusing the company of wrongful death. On Tuesday, OpenAI responded to the lawsuit with a filing of its own, arguing that it shouldn't be held responsible for the teenager's death.

item.title: The US Military Wants to Fix Its Own Equipment. Defense Contractors Are Trying to Shoot That Down
item.description: A push by military contractors could alter pending legislation that would have empowered servicemembers to repair equipment. Lobbyists are pitching a subscription service instead.

item.title: Redwood Materials reportedly cuts 5% of staff after $350M raise
item.description: The battery recycling and cathode production company, founded by former Tesla CTO JB Straubel, has started using recycled battery materials to create energy storage solutions for AI data centers.

item.title: Pentagon contractors want to blow up military right to repair
item.description: Military contractors are trying to thwart a widely-supported right-to-repair provision in the annual defense policy bill — and their efforts may pay off. A source familiar with the negotiations tells The Verge that there are significant concerns that the bill’s right-to-repair language will be replaced by a “data-as-a-service” model, potentially requiring the Department of Defense […]...

item.title: U.S. Bank Calls Ability to Freeze Stablecoins ‘Appealing’ as Crypto Has Completely Lost the Plot
item.description: Dark days for the bros.

item.title: Prices have dropped again on Black Friday speaker deals — shop Bose, JBL, Sony, Ultimate Ears
item.description: We've curated a list of all the best early Black Friday speaker deals on brands like Bose, Sony, Echo, and JBL.

item.title: OpenAI denies allegations in teen death lawsuit
item.description: OpenAI says Adam Raine, who died by suicide, had a history of mental health issues and violated ChatGPT policies.

item.title: Sony Pulse Elite : l’un des meilleurs casques PS5 a droit à une belle réduction pour le Black Friday
item.description: Vous voulez entendre chaque pas ennemi dans Call of Duty ? Le Pulse Elite et ses transducteurs planaires sont en promo. Une technologie rare à ce prix qui change tout.

item.title: Weekly claims for unemployment benefits drop
item.description: However, job cuts announced recently by large companies typically take weeks or months to fully implement and may not yet be reflected in the claims data. The number of Americans applying for unemployment benefits declined last week in a sign that overall layoffs remain low, even as several high-profile companies have announced job cuts.

item.title: Jeff Bezos’ New AI Venture Quietly Acquired an Agentic Computing Startup
item.description: Project Prometheus has raised over $6 billion in funding and hired over 100 employees, a handful of whom joined through its acquisition of General Agents, according to records and sources.

item.title: J’adore cette guirlande connectée, et son prix pour le Black Friday aussi
item.description: Votre sapin mérite mieux qu'une guirlande qui clignote bêtement. Pour le Black Friday, la référence absolue de l'éclairage connecté devient enfin abordable, et c'est le moment de craquer.

item.title: 85+ Black Friday deals: We found record-low prices on AirPods, MacBooks, Samsung TVs, and Kindles
item.description: Get the latest Black Friday deals on Apple products, vacuums, headphones, power stations, and Legos. Save $250 on a new Apple laptop and 27% on a new Kindle.

item.title: The best early Black Friday Samsung deals: The Frame TV, Galaxy Watch 8, Galaxy S25 Ultra, and more
item.description: Shop the best early Black Friday Samsung deals include The Frame TV, Galaxy Watch 8, Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy Tab S11, and more.

item.title: 2025 Black Friday ads: Best deals from Walmart, Amazon, Best Buy, Kohls, Target, Home Depot, and more
item.description: Black Friday Ads. Browse the best deals from Black Friday ads from Amazon, Target, Best Buy, Walmart, Home Depot, and more in 2025.

item.title: Retour sur la Lune : la Nasa doit faire des choix urgents avant qu’il ne soit trop tard
item.description: Dans un contexte de la course à la Lune, le président Trump a demandé au directeur par intérim de la Nasa d'assurer l'arrivée des États-Unis sur notre satellite avant celle des Chinois. Pourtant, malgré des ambitions affichées, SpaceX pourrait ne pas être prêt avant la fin de cette décennie,...

item.title: Here are 60 Best Buy Black Friday deals in my shopping cart – TVs, cheap laptops, AirPods, and more
item.description: I've been tracking the Best Buy Black Friday sale all month, and now I'm here to bring you all of the very best deals from the retailer's big end-of-year event.

item.title: Russell T Davies Says He’s Got the Grand Return of ‘Doctor Who’ Already Figured Out
item.description: Now that the BBC has confirmed the show's not-so-immediate future, the series' current showrunner is already making moves.

item.title: Voici les 25 meilleures offres du Black Friday, tout simplement
item.description: Le Black Friday commence officiellement ce vendredi 28 novembre, mais la plupart des marchands comme Amazon, Fnac, Darty ou encore Boulanger, ont déjà partagé la plupart de leurs offres. Nous vous avons alors préparé un petit florilège des meilleures promotions disponibles actuellement.

item.title: Annoyed by a ‘New York Times’ headline? It seems like that’s increasingly the Gray Lady’s goal
item.description: Several ‘New York Times’ headlines in 2025 have earned severe social media backlash. Is it happening on purpose? The job of a headline is to draw attention to the article beneath it. When a headline instead draws attention to itself, it feels as wrong as a carnival barker cursing out passersby.

item.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
item.description: A timeline of ChatGPT product updates and releases, starting with the latest, which we’ve been updating throughout the year.

item.title: Black Friday laptop deals are live — and amazing. Here are 14 models Id buy in a heartbeat.
item.description: Mashable's senior shopping reporter (and laptop expert) rounds up the best early Black Friday laptop deals across retailers like Amazon and Best Buy.
